```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(metabolyseR)
library(metaboData)
```

```{r analysis_data}
d <- analysisData(abr1$neg,abr1$fact)
```

```{r}
print(d)
```

```{r pre_treat}
d <- d %>%
  occupancyMaximum(cls = 'day') %>%
  transformTICnorm()
```

```{r pca}
plotPCA(d,cls = 'day')
```

```{r supervised_RF}
plotSupervisedRF(d,cls = 'day')
```

```{r}
rf_results <- d %>%
  randomForest(cls = 'day',binary = TRUE)
```

```{r}
plotMeasures(rf_results,response = 'day')
```

```{r}
plotExplanatoryHeatmap(rf_results)
```
